experiences.title: Applications Developer 2
experiences.details: Add new features to Oracle fusion which improve the product performance and user experience. Fix critical customer bugs at the best possible time frame. Mentor new joinee's. Agile/SCRUM software development. Tech stack used - Java with Oracle ADF framework, PL/SQL. JUnits and utPLSQL for performing unit test. Also had the opportunity to work with Oracle Business Intelligence Publisher and performed internal R&D work. Part of Oracle interview panel to find new talented developers.

experiences.title: Engineer Product Development
experiences.details: Performing Proof of Concept work and research on the UI development using ES6, React/Redux to facilitate microservice architecture.
